title: first font - monoline
content:
hi

id like some feedback on this font im designing. its monoline as i want to be able to dynamically alter the stroke, slanting etc. in processing

you can play with the uppercase at [www.greenbuddha.com/tgr](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819201802/http:/www.greenbuddha.com/tgr "www.greenbuddha.com/tgr")

regards  
mike
author: Michael Green

comments.content:
I think it's hard to get a grasp of all the elements of your typeface while trying to run the application. Is there an example in an image format you can post on the site?

Thanks.
I agree with Andy. Send a pdf to help us to help you. ;^)
